meanings.sent1: The baker used wheaten flour to make delicious bread.
meanings.sent2: The wheaten fields swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The wheaten cookies looked like little pieces of sunshine.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a wheaten glow, like strands of golden wheat.
meanings.sent5: The wheaten color of the house made it stand out in the neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: The farmer grew wheaten crops in the fertile soil.
meanings.sent2: The wheaten harvest was bountiful this year.
meanings.sent3: The wheaten aroma of fresh bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her wheaten sweater kept her warm on chilly days.
meanings.sent5: The wheaten fields stretched as far as the eye could see.

meanings.definition: A type of dog breed with a soft, silky, wheaten-colored coat.
meanings.sent1: The wheaten terrier wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent2: She brushed the wheaten dog's coat to keep it shiny.
meanings.sent3: The wheaten puppy chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The wheaten retriever loved playing fetch in the park.
meanings.sent5: The wheaten dog's fur felt like silk to the touch.
